title: When YOU LOSE Your BRAKES!!! In the RAIN | American Truck Simulator #shorts #ats #simulator

tasks.task: Drive tractors to till soil for planting vegetable garden.
subtasks: Operate steering wheel to navigate tractor.
Engage hydraulic lift to raise and lower implement.
Release clutch pedal to engage power take-off (PTO).
Monitor soil condition and implement performance.

tasks.task: Plant seeds into tilled soil using tractor implement.
subtasks: Operate seed drill or planter attachment.
Monitor seed spacing and planting depth.
Release clutch pedal to engage seed planting mechanism.

tasks.task: Water plants using irrigation system controlled by tractor.
subtasks: Connect water hose to tractor implements.
Operate hydraulic system to drive sprinklers.
Adjust watering schedule based on weather conditions.
Walk between rows, bending down to pick vegetables.
Gently place harvested vegetables into containers or bags.
Transport harvested produce to storage or deliver to market.
